resources.string: Select text color on orange background:

Some explanations: 
 
 • About "Select color on orange background": When choosing the orange theme or when there are laboratory classes in the schedule, I had a question:"Which color would be better here? Black or white?". So I decided to leave the choice to you. 
 
 • About languages: Since the API does not provide the ability to receive data in different languages in a convenient format, there will be some problems and limitations in translation. But here's the main thing that can be said about languages: 
 - The application interface is fully translated wherever possible; 
 - The data received from the API is translated only into Ukrainian and English, but usually, in Ukrainian, they will be in a shortened format, and in English - in full. If you choose Russian, the API data will be in Ukrainian. 
 
 • About 'Weekday text type in the schedule': When you open the schedule page, for convenience, the day of the week is displayed below the date. And you have the option to choose whether it will be 'Thursday' or 'Thu'. 
 
 • About 'Lesson type text type': When you open the schedule page, the type of lesson is displayed at the top right. And you can choose how it will be displayed. 
Examples: Lecture lesson, Lecture, Lec. Or Laboratory lesson, Laboratory, Lab. 
 
 • About 'Date format': When you want to choose your own day of the week, the date format will depend on this setting. Also, when you are on the schedule page, it will be displayed in this format.

General Information:

From the very beginning, this app was created as a faster and more convenient way to find out the schedule, avoiding the use of bots in messengers and the website. But over time, I decided to add more functionality, although it still performs its main task excellently.

About the Developers:

The app itself was created by a student of the State Tax University, KB-23-1 group (at least, at the time of creating the app, I was in this group), Kovalskyi Andrii Oleksandrovych (born in 2004). But this app wouldn\'t look like it does now without the help of a student from the same university and the group, Hnylosyra Oleksandr Sergiyovych (born in 2003). He helped with the overall look of the app.

Agreement Terms:

First of all, I want to say that the app does not store any data that can be used against you. It only stores the following data: your group identifier and its name, your faculty identifier, your course, the time of the last data check, saved settings.
This means that you automatically agree to have this data saved and used for more convenient use of the app. If you disagree, the only thing you can do is delete the app and not use it.
Also, you agree that the app will send information to the developer about what you opened the app and what you used it for. This is necessary for analyzing what may need to be changed or removed in the app.

What Can the App Do?

The app can do the following: - show you today\'s schedule using only 2 clicks, one of which is opening the app;
- choose and change your group;
- see the bell schedule;
- choose settings to your liking.
Most likely, this functionality will remain and will not change.
